name: Froogy
description:
Froggy was programed to improve programingskills. 
It was coded with Unreal Engine 4 and you can explore 3 Level at the moment.  

Controls:

Keyboard
A,D, arrow left, arrow right - Move
Space , w , arrow up - Jump
Left Shift - Run
Left Ctrl - Stamp

Xbox Controller
Left Stick - Move
A Button - Jump
X Button - Run
B Button - Stamp

Sprites made by Pixel Frog
